name: Proleague
description: ProLeague is a web3 infrastructure gaming platform that provides gamers automation of tournaments, leaderboards, leagues, matchmaking, and instant payouts. ProLeague is the first multisided platform hub for Brands, Developers, Content Creators, Tournament Organizers, Guilds, and teams to unite and exchange value. The legacy Esports platform technology needs a revamp focusing on the players functionality first. We cater to hyper-casual and esports titles.
